attributes.action: Giving access to the use of private hospital beds to Fight against COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: To save more lives, have better resources for back up to fight against COVID-19. Our goverment needs to take concrete steps, from a visual aspect there have been no strategic plan to combat this virus, and the steps taken have been too little too slow to say the least. Until  ITALY's lockdown, airlines passengers from Italy were still flying in and out of UK with no tests being done at the borders, or any questions being asked.
attributes.background:
Private sector hospitals hold about 8000 beds between them,The door should be opened fully so patients can be admitted to use these beds in th fight againts COVID 19 treatment.
Giving access to the private sector hospital beds will take the strain off the NHS, and give our nation a fighting chance.
